Amity Institute of NanoTechnology has numerous international collaborations/MoUs for student dissertations, academic exchange, and research. For the last few years, the institute has shown exponential growth in research with more than 586 research papers, 41 extramural research grants worth 11.22 crores, 88 patents and one technology transfer. The department also offers placement opportunities for students in companies like Wipro, Indian Oil Corporation, UpGrad, ZYCUS, Vaco Binary Semantics, Zomato, Accenture, etc.

The undergraduate courses of the Institute are affiliated with Lucknow University and the postgraduate courses are affiliated with Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Azad University (AKTU) and is approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE). IISE Group of Institutions offers UG and PG courses in the disciplines of management, media studies and computer application. The institute’s most popular courses include the BJMC and MCA courses. Admission to the BJMC course at the institution is purely merit-based. However, students are required to have a valid rank in UPSEE to take admission to the MCA course. Apart from that, the college also offers UG degree courses in Mass Communication, Broadcast Journalism, Electronic Media, BBA, B.Com and an MBA course. It offers affordable and employment-oriented Undergraduate and Postgraduate courses in Commerce, Education, Business Administration, and International Business. Admission to college programs is granted to aspiring students depending on their merit in the previous year’s qualifying exam and score of the UP JEE B.Ed entrance exam. The institute is accredited by NAAC, approved by NCTE, and UGC, and is affiliated with the Chaudhary Charan Singh University of Meerut.

Teerthanker Mahaveer University, Faculty of Education, Moradabad
College_Summary: Faculty of Education was established in 2003. This College is affiliated to Teerthanker Mahaveer University - [TMU], Moradabad. It is Co-education institute. The College offers Bachelor of Education (B.Ed.) and Master of Education (M.Ed.). Master of Education (M.Ed.) was introduced in the year 2006. The institute is committed to nurture, motivate and empower the prospective teachers who will serve as beacon lights for posterity to accept the challenges of life. The College mission and vision is to speak of transforming an individual into a competent educator by professionally teaching the content matter at B.Ed. and M.Ed. level enriched through inter disciplinary approach accompanied with curricular and co-curricular activities.

Vidya Institute of Creative Teaching - [VICT], Meerut
College_Summary: Vidya Institute of Creative Teaching was set up with an aim to prepare and groom students to become excellent teachers and bring a change in the society with their vision and teaching skills. They can not only become good teachers but also become good administrators, coaches, counsellors, administers, specialists and researchers. The teaching responsibility is taken quite seriously by the Institute and ensures that they keep in tune with the fast changes taking place in the field of education. They update their curricula so that they can meet the latest demands of the field and fulfil them quite effectively. The ambience of the institute is excellent and motivates the students to work hard and study with utmost dedication and focus. The students get excellent value based education that helps them to look forward to a bright future.

College_Name: Amity School of Computer Sciences, Noida
Allahabad University
College_Summary: Allahabad University is the fourth oldest Public University in India after Calcutta, Bombay and Madras University. The university, also known as the Oxford of the East, has been declared an “Institute of National Importance”. Allahabad University is recognised by the UGC and is a very large advanced educational institution with about 45,000 students on campus.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws [B.A.L.L.B.]

College_Name: Bhatkhande Music Institute, Lucknow
College_Summary: Bhatkhande Music Institute is a most popular music institute in the city of Lucknow. It offers music education in instrumental, vocal music, rhythms, musicology, dance and research in music. Institute's origin is rooted back in 1926 as Marris College of Music established in 1926 by Vishnu Narayan Bhatkhande. Later in the year 1966 Govt. of Uttar Pradesh took its management and renamed as Bhatkhande Music College of Hindustani Music and now as Bhatkhande Music Institute University. Institute has organized various annual festivals in which most renowned artists like Zakhir Hussain, Amjad Ali Khan, N Rajam, Pt. Ravishankar and Sitara Devi had performed.  University is sought out to be the favorite destination for the students from Nepal, Sri Lanka, Central and East Asian Countries.

College_Name: BU Jhansi
College_Summary: Bundelkhand University (BU Jhansi) is one of the best universities located in Jhansi city of the state of Uttar Pradesh in India. The university offers 104 different Professional, Technical, Vocational, and Research Programs. The University has been ranked 73 in Pharmacy by NIRF 2022 Ranking Framework. BU Jhansi imparts education through its 40 Institutes/ departments of Higher Learning and affiliated colleges. Check BU Jhansi Affiliated Colleges.

College_Name: DBRAU
College_Summary: Dr. Bhimrao Ambedkar University (DBRAU) also popular as Agra University is a government University established in 1927. DBRAU is recognized by UGC and is accredited ‘B++’ by NAAC. The University has 15 residential Institutes spread out over its four residential campuses: Paliwal Park, Khandari Campus, Civil Lines Campus, and Chhaleshar Campus. DBRAU now caters to the educational need of the 7 districts of Agra Division Agra, Aligarh, Mainpuri, Hathras, Firozabad, Etah, and Mathura. DBRAU aims to advance education and establish itself as a hub of excellence at national and international Levels. Currently, around 200 colleges are affiliated with DBRAU. Read more about DBRAU Affiliated Colleges

College_Name: RMLAU (Avadh University)
College_Summary: Dr. Ram Manohar Lohia Avadh University (RMLAU), established in the year 1975 by the Govt. of Uttar Pradesh is popularly known as Avadh University. It is a State University located in the Faizabad city of Uttar Pradesh. RMLAU was accredited with a ‘B’ grade by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC). The University is also recognized by University Grants Commission (UGC). Further, RMLAU is also a member of AIU. Currently, the university caters education to about 5 lakh regular/private students through its 9 residential PG departments and on-campus Institute of Engineering along with more than 600 affiliated colleges spread over the 7 districts of Ayodhya, Sultanpur, Ambedkarnagar, Lucknow, Barabanki, Baharaich, and Gonda.

College_Name: AKTU
College_Summary: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University (AKTU) formerly known as UP Technical University (UPTU) is one of the premier and largest technical universities in India. AKTU has been consistently ranked among the top 50 institutions of India. Currently, the university has an enrollment of more than 4,00,000 students in various programs across 756 AKTU affiliated colleges and institutions spanning over the entire UP state.

College_Name: Gautam Buddha University (GBU), Greater Noida
College_Summary: Gautam Buddha University is a state university, located in Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh with 511 acres of campus area. The university is approved by University Grants Commission (UGC) and has been accredited by NAAC with B+ Grade. The University offers various undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral programs in the domains of Arts, Commerce, Science, Engineering, Management, Computer Applications, Biotechnology, Buddhist studies, and so on.

College_Name: Khwaja Moinuddin Chishti Language University, Lucknow
College_Summary: Khwaja Moinuddin Chishti Language University was established in the year 2009. The university is located in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh. The university is affiliated by University Grants Commission. The university has a vast campus equipped with all the facilities for the students. Khwaja Moinuddin Chishti Language University offers Under-Graduate and Post-Graduate courses with the subjects – Urdu, Arabic, Persian, English, Hindi, Geography, History, Economics, Home-Science, Physical Education, Political Science, Education, Commerce, Computer Application, Business Administration and Journalism and Mass Communication.

College_Name: Nehru Gram Bharati University
College_Summary: Nehru Gram Bharati University [NGBU], Allahabad, also known as Nehru Gram Bharati Vishwavidyalaya, Allahabad, also comprising Rajiv Gandhi Snatkottar Mahavidyalaya is a deemed to be university under section 3 of UGC Act, 1956. NGBU is accredited by NAAC with a B+ grade and has all the other mandatory approvals required from different councils like BCI for the various courses it runs.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws [B.A.L.L.B.]

College_Name: VBSPU (Purvanchal University)
College_Summary: Veer Bahadur Singh Purvanchal University (VBSPU) formerly known as Purvanchal University is located in Jaunpur, was founded on October 2, 1987, in Uttar Pradesh. The University offers UG and PG courses in streams like Engineering and Technology, Medicine, Management Studies, Science, and Applied Social Sciences. Admission to  most of the UG and PG programs is done through the PUCAT, while BTech admissions are based on JEE Main scores followed by counselling.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws [BALLB] {Hons.}

College_Name: Sampurnanand Sanskrit University - [SSVV]
College_Summary: Sampurnanand Sanskrit Vishwavidyalaya Varanasi (SSVV) also known as Sampurnanand Sanskrit University is a premier institute of higher education established in the year 1791. It is a state university located in Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh, specializing in Sanskrit and related fields. The University is recognized by UGC and has been accredited by NAAC. There are above 1,200 Sanskrit-medium colleges & schools affiliated with this university. The university offers UG, PG, research programs under five departments, and also Diploma, PG Diploma courses across different specializations. Admission is based on the entrance exam conducted by the university

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Library and Information Science [B.Lib.I.Sc]

College_Name: Subharti University (SVSU)

Upper_Section_Details.Approval: NCTE, DCI, AICTE, PCI, INC, MCI, IAP, BCI, UGC, AIU

College_Summary: Swami Vivekanand Subharti University (SVSU) is a private Institute that was established in 2008. The Institute has been approved by NCTE, DCI, PCI, INC, MCI, AICTE, UGC and AIU and also has been accredited with NAAC. The University was set up under the Swami Vivekanand Subharti Vishwavidyalaya Uttar Pradesh Adhiniyam 2008.

College_Name: UPRTOU
College_Summary: Uttar Pradesh Rajarshi Tandon Open University (UPRTOU) is a government-open university. UPRTOU is recognised by the Distance Education Council (DEC), National Council for Teacher Education (NCTE), AICTE and UGC’s Distance Education Bureau. Established in 1999, UPRTOU is located in Prayagraj (formerly Allahabad). The open university operates from 9 schools and offers UG, PG, Diploma, Certificate, and PhD programmes. Admission to the majority of the courses is merit-based except B.Ed, B.Ed (SE) programs. Admissions into the Education courses, the university conducts its own entrance exam.

College_Name: Baba Bindeshwari Singh Institute of Technology and Management, Varanasi
Government Polytechnic, Ghaziabad
College_Summary: Government Polytechnic College Ghaziabad was established in 1981. The students are offered with High School Diploma Courses, Undergraduate Diploma Courses, and Post Graduate Diploma Courses under four streams that are Design, Engineering, Science, and Mass Communication & Media. Students need to qualify Joint Entrance Examination and attain the qualifying rank to get Admission on these Courses. Applications are available online on the website of JEE Council UP.

College_Name: Government Polytechnic, Kanpur
College_Summary: Government Polytechnic, Kanpur (GP Kanpur), a technical education institution and has been established in 1958. The college was approved by AICTE, New Delhi and affiliated to BTEUP, Lucknow.

College_Name: Hewett Polytechnic - [HP], Lucknow
College_Summary: Hewett Polytechnic College Lucknow which was initially started in Gorakhpur in 1904 became a renowned institute after it got shifted to Lucknow in 1908. The institute offers four courses in Civil, Electrical, Mechanical Engineering, and Information Technology. The college also offers PG Diploma courses. Admission to these courses is entrance based.

College_Name: Sevdie Institute of Management and Technology -[SIMT], Lucknow

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Marketing and Sales Management

College_Name: HLM Group of Institutions, Ghaziabad
College_Summary: HLM Group of Institutions, Ghaziabad was established in 2005 and is running under the aegis of HLM Educational Society. It is affiliated to Chaudhary Charan Singh University / Meerut University. It is approved by National Council for Teacher Education (N.C.T.E), Bar Council of India (BCI) and All India Council for Technical Education (A.I.C.T.E). It is also accredited by National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC). It is an ISO-9001-2008 Certified institute. The college offers Bachelor and Master Degree in the field of Commerce, Law and Education.

College_Name: FMS BHU
College_Summary: The Faculty of Management Studies of BHU functions under the Institute of Management Studies. It was established in 1968 and is a public institution offering only Management courses at PG and doctoral levels.

Asian Academy of Film & Television- [AAFT], Noida
College_Summary: Asian Academy of Film and Television (AAFT) is a private institution founded in 1993 at Noida, Uttar Pradesh. It is affiliated to the International Film and Television Research Centre and has international and national accreditations of MHRD, UGC, & ICMEI. The institute offers B.Des., B.A, B.Sc., BPA, at the UG level, MA, M.Sc., MPA at the PG level and also diploma & short term courses across various specializations. Admissions to the courses are based on Aptitude tests followed by a round of personal interview.

College_Name: Pandit Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Pashu Chikitsa Vigyan Vishwavidyalaya Evam Go  Anusandhan Sansthan - [DUVASU], Mathura
College_Summary: UP Pandit Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Pashu Chikitsa Vigyan Vishwavidyalaya Evam Go-Anusandhan Sansthan ( DUVASU) was founded by the UP government on 25th of October in the year 2001. It is one of the premier Veterinary Colleges of the country as it has contributed considerably towards research by meeting both national and international benchmark and has also produced a significant number of graduates, postgraduates, and research scholars.

It also aims to inculcate in the students moral, ethical and intellectual values. By doing so it wants to aid the society and nation as a whole.

College_Name: International Maritime Institute - [IMI], Greater Noida
College_Summary: The International Maritime Institute, established in 1991 is a private marine engineering college. The vision of the institute is to serve as an effective liaison of the maritime industry. It is the only maritime institute in North India offering B.Tech program affiliated to IMU, Chennai. Presently, IMI Greater Noida is running Pre Sea courses like Diploma in Nautical Science, B.Tech in Marine Engineering & Graduate Mechanical Engineering. Some Post sea and value-added courses are also available.

Asian Business School - [ABS], Noida
College_Summary: Asian Business School (ABS) is an AICTE approved, NBA-accredited, and AIU-affiliated private institute located in Noida which works under the aegis of the renowned Asian Education Group. The college has been ranked amongst the Top 10 Business Schools of India by The Knowledge Review magazine and ranked 6th in A++ category B School of India by Silicon India. It has been awarded as ‘Business School of the Year’ by The Academic Insights. The college is visited by over 300 recruiters every year and provides an opportunity of a one-week residential educational trip to Oxford Business College, Oxford, U.K. Its Board of Directors include prominent names like Sandeep Marwah, Anil Kapoor (Actor) and Boney Kapoor (Film Producer).

College_Name: Indus Business Academy - [IBA], Greater Noida
IILM Lucknow
College_Summary: IILM Academy for Higher Learning (IILM), Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh was established in the year of 2004. The private institute holds its approval by AICTE & MHRD. The institute offers MBA & PGDM courses falling under the faculty of Management and Financial Studies.

College_Name: SMS Lucknow
College_Summary: School of Management Sciences, Lucknow (SMS, Lucknow) is a business institution in Lucknow. SMS Lucknow is the shorthand name for the School of Management Sciences Lucknow. The National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) has given the college a grade of "B++" in its accreditation. As an expansion of the School of Management Sciences, Varanasi, it was founded in 2008.
